entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:05 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
